title: Democracy 3: Extremism DLC (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
Note: Requires the base game installed.
- Run "setup_democracy3_extremism_dlc_2.9.0.15.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: DEMOCRACY 3: EXTREMISM
Genre: Strategy - Simulation - Managerial
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.6.8) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: May 13, 2014
Size: 7.5 MB
Company: Positech Games / Positech Games
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/democracy_3_extremism

About:
Democracy 3: Extremism adds 33 new situations and policies that reflect the more extreme side of politics, all within the framework of a democracy. Fed up with just adjusting taxes and government spending in the conventional sense? Perhaps you think your people need the national anthem sung at the start of every news broadcast? Or maybe what they are crying out for is a ban on divorce, or same-sex relationships? Alternatively you might like to close your countries airports to save the environment, or maybe outright ban private education?
How far to the extremes can you take your country and still maintain the support of the people (and avoid some of them putting a gun to your head). Democracy 3:Extremism, for when fiddling with tax rates simply isn't enough!
Includes 33 new situations and policies!
Work to maintain the support of your people while you bring into law extremist policies!
Now's your chance to see what happens when you enact far right or left policies; will your country become a utopia or a dictatorship in everything but name?

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, Processor 2 GHz (Dual Core), 1 GB RAM (4 GB recommended), Directx 9.0c-compatible 3D graphics card with 256 MB VRAM, 500 MB HDD, DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card, mouse, keyboard
